attributes.action: Proper investigation of tax or benefit fraud claims made from Mums about Dads
attributes.additional_details: Millions of children are missing out on the correct financial support due to parents claiming to be on benefits. Fathers work cash in hand to get out of paying what they should. Why should these children miss out? The reason for this a lot of the time is financial control. If a partner is claiming benefits properly, mothers should receive an entitlement from the government for a father with minimum wage that the father then has to pay back to the government when they find work again.
attributes.background: Government should set up a team devoted to ensuring parents that claim the other parent of their children is committing benefit fraud to purposely get out of paying child maintenance are investigated fully and should they be claiming benefits correctly, government should help mums financially

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  Benefit fraud is already illegal and there is a system for reporting it.  You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/national-benefit-fraud-hotline
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
